title: The person who made this...

embed.description: I ship FlutterDash. I love my flutterdash toy shes cute af I dont ene ship the two for real I prefer appledash but what cna ya do I didn't have an AJ toy on han

body:
...needs to get help.

Like,* yesterday*.

I'm generally content to let people do what they want as long as it isn't hurting anyone...but bro. Brosef. Dude. Man. You need some *help*.
